mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_birth, user_pwd, user_name, user_nick, user_phone, user_email, join_date, user_info_agree, user_serv_agree ) values(#{user_id},#{user_birth}, #{user_pwd},#{user_name},#{user_nick},#{user_phone},#{user_email}, now(),#{user_info_agree}, #{user_serv_agree})
mapper.select: select * from user where user_id=#{user_id} and user_pwd=#{user_pwd}
select * from user where user_name=#{user_name} and user_phone=#{user_phone}
select * from user where user_name=#{user_name} and user_email=#{user_email}
select count(*) from user where user_id
mapper.update: update user set user_pwd=#{user_pwd} where user_id=#{user_id} and user_name=#{user_name} and user_email=#{user_email}
